titles.title: I Could Sing Of Your Love Forever

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Over the mountains and the sea Your river runs with love for me And I will open up my heart And let the healer set me free I’m happy to be in the truth and I will daily lift my hands For I will always sing of when Your love came down{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I could sing of Your love forever (4x) Oh I feel like dancing. It’s foolishness I know. But when the world has seen the light They will dance with joy like we’re dancing now{/lang-eng}
